name: Seas the Opportunity
description:
Involves fishing, treasure hunting, and exploring the ocean

Controls:

Move:

W = Up

A = Left

S = Down

D = Right

Spacebar = Select

P = Pause

M = Map

Mouse Right Click = Sell or drop items

Mouse wheel up or down = Scroll inventory

Alt + Enter = Toggles fullscreen

Escape = escapes fishing

This demo is very basic, made for mechanics testing and basic game loop.

There is one known bug I have not find a fix for yet, if you spam the spacebar while fishing can cause the game to lock up.
